channel.title: Think this is worth it? Opinions please!
channel.description:
Ok so, im looking to buy a *cheap* half decent Desktop PC as mine is powered via Coal atm -.-
Anywho, i have found this on a shop from ebay and it seems pretty good, (i know i must install my own OS).
[url=http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/VIBOX-DUAL-R-NEW-INTEL-CELERON-3400-DUAL-CORE-4GB-RAM-1TB-DESKTOP-PC-COMPUTER-/200670105770?pt=UK_Computing_DesktopPCs&hash=item2eb8ded0aa#ht_1839wt_1003]http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/VIBOX-DUAL-R-NEW-INTEL-CELERON-3400-DUAL-CORE-4GB-RAM-1TB-DESKTOP-PC-COMPUTER-/200670105770?pt=UK_Computing_DesktopPCs&hash=item2eb8ded0aa#ht_1839wt_1003[/url]
Please could i have opinions on this matter.
Thankyou in advance :)
P.S. Im not asking if i SHOULD buy from ebay, im just asking if u think this is good for the money :D

item.title: Think this is worth it? Opinions please!
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

Switch to Linux. You’ll save like 90% of your diskspace, since the OS takes up pratically nothing.

Read full topic
item.source: Think this is worth it? Opinions please!

item.title: Think this is worth it? Opinions please!
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:15, topic:432537”][quote author=Aff link=topic=535247.msg3913733#msg3913733 date=1328990986]
for <$400 CAD, that’s worth it, but looking at it from the perspective where it’s a pretty shitty overall computer (the good specs aren’t even that necessary; i don’t see how you could use 1tb of storage), i wouldn’t buy it

edit: unless you’re t4 and have 1.3tb of porn, you’re not going to need a 1tb hdd
[/quote]
or have an extensive movie/tv/music collection.[/quote]
QFT

  • steam games etc

Read full topic
item.source: Think this is worth it? Opinions please!

for <$400 CAD, that’s worth it, but looking at it from the perspective where it’s a pretty shitty overall computer (the good specs aren’t even that necessary; i don’t see how you could use 1tb of storage), i wouldn’t buy it

I have 2tb of drives filled and I’m needing more, only 20gb of which is porn… just sayin’.
[/quote]3tb here, out of 5tb total.[/quote]
Are we still talking about porn here…?

Oh and this is just on my laptop.

item.title: Think this is worth it? Opinions please!
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:4, topic:432537”]like CJ had said, the prosessor is complete shit.

becides that, the RAM + Diskspace is decent…its nothing really special. i guess it depends what you’d be useing it for. if your useing it for hardcore gamming, get An AlienWare computer :P[/quote]

The name drips with overpriced systems.

Read full topic
item.source: Think this is worth it? Opinions please!

item.title: Think this is worth it? Opinions please!
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:5, topic:432537”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=535247.msg3913499#msg3913499 date=1328980280]
like CJ had said, the prosessor is complete shit.

becides that, the RAM + Diskspace is decent…its nothing really special. i guess it depends what you’d be useing it for. if your useing it for hardcore gamming, get An AlienWare computer
[/quote]

Or you could just assemble a good gaming build yourself for a fourth of the cost of an alienware. Alienware’s are typically extremely overpriced.[/quote]Alienware is a scam.

Now to ask the fundamental question: What do you plan on using your computer for? If games, mention the most demanding games you’ll be playing, and i can probably whip you up a pretty nice rig.

Read full topic

item.title: Think this is worth it? Opinions please!
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

The Intel Celeron is the worst intel desktop processor there is.

Despite that, it’s still worth the price, though don’t expect it to be amazing because it seems to be all looks and cheap specifications (4gb ram is pretty cheap, and a 1tb hdd before the floods was only £30).

What would you be using it for?

Read full topic
